coreAttributes.name: sissification cage
coreAttributes.description: An ornate metal cage, designed to be fit in place around someone's penis in order to prevent it from being used in penetrative sex. When worn, it will physically prevent an erection from occurring.

replacementText.self:
[npc.Name] [npc.verb(lock)] the sissification cage in place around [npc.her] [npc.penis]. #IF (!npc.hasStatusEffect(SE_subsophie_sissification_cage)) #THEN [##npc.addStatusEffect(SE_subsophie_sissification_cage, 31)]
[npc.Name] [npc.verb(feel)] a [style.boldBad(strange feeling)] in [npc.her] [npc.penis]... #ENDIF
replacementText.other:
[npc.Name] [npc.verb(lock)] the sissification cage in place around [npc2.namePos] [npc2.penis]. #IF (!npc2.hasStatusEffect(SE_subsophie_sissification_cage)) #THEN [##npc2.addStatusEffect(SE_subsophie_sissification_cage, 31)]
[npc2.Name] [npc2.verb(feel)] a [style.boldBad(strange feeling)] in [npc2.her] [npc2.penis]... #ENDIF
replacementText.otherRough:
[npc.Name] roughly squeezes [npc2.namePos] [npc2.penis] before locking it inside the sissification cage. #IF (!npc2.hasStatusEffect(SE_subsophie_sissification_cage)) #THEN [##npc2.addStatusEffect(SE_subsophie_sissification_cage, 31)]
[npc2.Name] [npc2.verb(feel)] a [style.boldBad(strange feeling)] in [npc2.her] [npc2.penis]... #ENDIF

displacementText.self:
[npc.Name] [npc.verb(unlock)] and [npc.verb(remove)] the sissification cage that was imprisoning [npc.her] [npc.penis]. [##npc.removeStatusEffect(SE_subsophie_sissification_cage)]
[npc.Name] no longer [npc.verb(feel)] the strange feeling in [npc.her] [npc.penis].
displacementText.other:
[npc.Name] [npc.verb(unlock)] and [npc.verb(remove)] the sissification cage that was imprisoning [npc2.namePos] [npc2.penis]. [##npc2.removeStatusEffect(SE_subsophie_sissification_cage)]
[npc2.Name] no longer [npc2.verb(feel)] the strange feeling in [npc2.her] [npc2.penis].
displacementText.otherRough:
[npc.Name] impatiently [npc.verb(unlock)] and [npc.verb(pull)] off the sissification cage that was imprisoning [npc2.namePos] [npc2.penis]. [##npc2.removeStatusEffect(SE_subsophie_sissification_cage)]
[npc2.Name] no longer [npc2.verb(feel)] the strange feeling in [npc2.her] [npc2.penis].
